## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo:`

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(readxl)
library(stargazer)

# Load dataset
df <- read_excel("C:\\Users\\USER\\OneDrive - Institute of Business Administration\\Desktop\\Econometric\\Week04TRACTOR7.xlsx")

# Create log-transformed sale price
df$ln_saleprice <- log(df$saleprice)

# Generate histograms
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
hist(df$saleprice, main="Histogram of Sale Price", xlab="Sale Price", col="lightblue", border="black")
hist(df$ln_saleprice, main="Histogram of Log Sale Price", xlab="Log of Sale Price", col="orange", border="black")

```

```{r}
install.packages("stargazer") 
```

```{r}
# Basic model (excluding `cab` for now)
model <- lm(ln_saleprice ~ horsepower + age + enghours + diesel + fwd + manual + johndeere + spring + summer + winter, data=df)

# Display results
summary(model)
stargazer(model, type="text")

```

```{r}
# Create squared horsepower variable
df$horsepower_squared <- df$horsepower^2

# Run the polynomial regression
model2 <- lm(ln_saleprice ~ horsepower + horsepower_squared + age + enghours + diesel + fwd + manual + johndeere + spring + summer + winter, data=df)

# Display results
summary(model2)
stargazer(model, model2, type="text")

```

```{r}
# Run regression with cab included
model3 <- lm(ln_saleprice ~ horsepower + horsepower_squared + age + enghours + diesel + fwd + manual + johndeere + spring + summer + winter + cab, data=df)

# Display results
summary(model3)
stargazer(model2, model3, type="text")

```

```{r}
# Create interaction term
df$enghours_diesel <- df$enghours * df$diesel

# Run regression with interaction term
model4 <- lm(ln_saleprice ~ horsepower + horsepower_squared + age + enghours + diesel + fwd + manual + johndeere + spring + summer + winter + cab + enghours_diesel, data=df)

# Display results
summary(model4)
stargazer(model3, model4, type="text")

```
